item.title: EP 861 - Is The Past Better Than Your Future?
item.itunes:title: Is The Past Better Than Your Future?
item.description:
Today we find the first ghostbuster guidebook, and then we time slip back to the 60s and find out the past may be better than the future!

 

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!

https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

Amazon Wish List

https://www.amazon.com/hz/wishlist/ls/28CIOGSFRUXAD?ref_=wl_share

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

“Alien Flyer” By TVP VT U

https://imgur.com/gallery/aPN1Fnw

 

Links:

EP 858 - What Can Scare A Ghost?

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-858-what-can-scare-a-ghost

EP 859 - The Hotel On The Edge Of Reality (Time Slip episode)

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-859-the-hotel-on-the-edge-of-reality

Boo Who? The World’s Oldest Ghost Drawing May Have Been Found on an Ancient Babylonian Tablet at the British Museum

https://news.artnet.com/art-world/oldest-ghost-british-museum-2023211

3,500-Year-Old Babylonian Tablet May Contain Earliest Known Depiction of a Ghost

https://www.smithsonianmag.com/smart-news/3500-year-old-babylonian-tablet-may-hold-earliest-known-ghost-image-180978923/

The First Ghosts: A rich history of ancient ghosts and ghost stories from the British Museum curator

https://tinyurl.com/2p89dh7v

The Time Traveling Thief: Sean Davies Story

https://anomalien.com/the-time-traveling-thief-sean-davies-story/

The Good, the Bad and The Dudley - stab victim used art to cope after unprovoked attack

https://www.expressandstar.com/editors-picks/2014/12/22/the-good-the-bad-and-the-dudley-stab-victim-used-art-to-cope-after-unprovoked-attack/

Argentina: Further Developments in the Irma Rick Abduction Case

http://inexplicata.blogspot.com/2021/12/argentina-further-developments-in-irma.html

 

------------------------------------------------

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Simple
